message: I'm excited to offer you this premium product, known for its exceptional quality and durability. It's a rare opportunity to get your hands on a top-notch item at a fixed price of $100. I'm confident you'll love it, and I'm willing to make a one-time offer. What do you say? Will you take it home with you today?
I trust your recommendation and am willing to take the risk for the potential reward. Let's go for it!

I'm happy to share with you a unique opportunity to get a product that's still functional, but might not be the best representation of our usual standards. I'm offering it to you at the same price of $100, and I'm willing to stand behind its quality. However, I want to be upfront with you - this product might not last as long as our usual offerings. But hey, it's a great chance to get something at a steal! What do you think? Will you take a chance on it?
I appreciate the transparency and the value proposition. Given my previous positive experience, I'm willing to take another chance and see if this product meets my expectations.

I'm glad you're willing to give us another chance! I want to make sure you're aware that this product is still not our usual standard, and it might not meet your expectations. However, I'm willing to offer it to you at the same price of $100, and I'll throw in a special bonus - a 10-minute consultation with our expert team to help you get the most out of this product. What do you think? Is the potential value of the consultation worth taking another chance on this product?
The additional value of the consultation seems beneficial. Considering the risk, I believe it could provide enough value to justify purchasing this product.
